messages.subject: brittany wright wants you to join The Jungle Fun & Adventure Email Club
messages.msgSnippet: I thought you guys in Arizona might be able to use this coupon. Your friend brittany has indicated that you might be interested in The Jungle Fun & Adventure
messages.messageBody:
I thought you guys in Arizona might be able to use this coupon.

Your friend brittany has indicated that you might be interested in The Jungle Fun & Adventure Email Club. If you would like to join this club, please use the following URL:

http://epi.s4m0.com/i.p?m=2127&ref=0493T2J9M94CH8096VC7&e=Unschooling-dotcom%40yahoogroups.com

The purpose of our club is to provide select customers with targeted news and discounts. We believe that you will enjoy the benefits of being a member, and we hope that you will accept our offer to join.

Thank you,
Jungle Fun & Adventure
